reviewText: All in one shot - the kids love it!!!!!

Used this on a super long car ride with our 1.5 yr olds and it made the drive WAY easier. And even after 20 hrs of silly songs I still enjoy them with my kids! Maybe because anything is better than a child screaming in their car seat ;). But really these songs are so funny and clever. Very enjoyable!
Veggie Tales is a must have for any toddler.  It teaches, values, morals, and great skills for an all around good mannered child.
My son truly loves this dvd!! He gets off the school bus and, runs upstairs to watch it!! Such a happy kid!!
Very entertaining collection of Bob & Larry's silliest songs!  Our kids love singing along, and we find ourselves doing the same.
This movie of all the Silly Songs is so cute. Perfect for in the car on our daughters dvd player. She loves it.
I am disappointed with this collection of Silly Songs because it does not use closed captioning.  The songs and animation are wonderful, though.

I ordered this DVD for my 8 month old son after watching a Veggie Tales movie. He loves the singing and this was perfect for him! It has enough songs to keep him entertained and you can play all of them or they are divided up into categories. It also comes with a sing-a-long disc the only thing we did not like about it was there is not a play all option. You have to select a song each time and that gets very annoying.
We have always enjoyed the Veggie Tales silly songs in each movie.  We have another baby and she likes the songs as well.  This DVD has hours of silly songs.  We love it!
Had this cassette for my grown daughters! So excited to get this for my youngest Gboy! Catering on the Veggietales tradition. <3
Grandchildren thoroughly enjoyed watching.
Decent show my kids like.
These are great for kids. I have purchased this for several children.
We ordered this for our one year old and she did not like it at all. Disappointed but the product itself is exactly as described . Cute songs !
This was a Christmas gift for our 2 year old grandson. He loves Veggie Tales.
Good variety of Silly Songs with Larry the cucumber.
Have no idea of how this was received. ungrateful family?

I love having this dvd in my car because, unlike a movie, no matter the length of the car ride there's no story that's getting interrupted. Also, I grew up watching Veggie Tales and love getting to share it now with my son.
My grandbaby always loves Veggie Tales
Great dvd...you can never go wrong when learning about God
Granddaughter loves Larry and his silly songs.
My 5 year old niece loves this dvd! So do her parents and I!
love these for greatgrandkids
As always, Bob and Larry entertain..
Literally entertained my 16mo daughter from start to finish; 2 hrs. We have to stope it after a few songs now or she would be glued to the tv but it's amazing when I'm trying to get anything done.

These songs are fun and catchy and will absolutely get stuck in your head. They are creative and clever and squeaky clean. They are perfect for children and you don't have to worry about what your kids are watching and if it is or isn't appropriate. They are definitely silly songs that kids love, but clever enough that adults will get a kick out of them as well. I'd definitely recommend this fun DVD! Appropriate for all ages!
She loves this!!

I would have gladly rated this DVD 5 stars but had to go with a 4 instead due to technical points only. It would have been nice if a "resume playing" or "chapter search" function had been included. Since neither are featured, this DVD starts back at the beginning every time it's been turned off then turned back on. My grandson has yet to see the last several songs even though he's watched it many times. That being said, my family has enjoyed Veggie Tales for a number of years especially all of their Silly Songs!! There's a good chance Mom or Dad will catch themselves singing along too!
Got this for my young Grandson& he LOVES it! Teaches & entertains. Arrived in record time& new. Has gotten a few more since. Boy or girl,this is a GREAT gift!
Gotta love Veggie Tales!  When my children were young teenagers Veggie Tales first came out and we have been a fan since then.
My 1 year old loves it
For the kids on my bus, they love it, I am also a big fan

My daughter loves Veggie Tales and we own a ton of the DVDs. This one was pretty irritating, because it does not have a "play all" option. My daughter is only 3 and still hasn't figured out the remote, so I have to walk into her room every 3 minutes to play the next song. If she didn't love the songs so much, I would probably have sent the movie back.
All our fave songs in one DVD.
Is there really a need to rate? Who does not love Veggie Tales? My eight month old grandson loves the Hairbrush Song. Me too!
PURE AWESOME-NESS!!!!  My kids can watch this DVD over and over and over.  The songs are SO catchy.  I find myself humming them when I least expect it.  PURE FUN for the whole family!!
My 2 year old granddaughter loves this!
My son loves it!
Good luck today
All the highlights of veggie tales on one disc.  At least it was always our favorite part.
Grandson loves it.
my kids love this movie!!
My son really enjoyed it!

Our son LOVES this DVD.  My only complaint is that on the karoke version of the songs, you have to select each one.  They don't play automatically like they do on the regular DVD.  But, all said, a great compilation of VeggieTale hits!

My children (2 and 3 yrs old) absolutely love this DVD...even the 16 year old although he may not admit it.  The songs are very catchy and I also enjoy hearing them...despite the fact that we've heard them hundreds of times by now.
My son absolutely loves this movie!  Thank you so very much for providing it for me!!!
My grandchildren love VeggieTales and to have all the silly songs in one DVD is great.
Favorite
Our kids grew up on these Veggies and now our grandchildren love them too!

My son loves veggie tales and loves music, so I love being able to just play all the silly songs for him! However I do have a problem with this DVD. Sometimes when I click the menu button on the remote to skip past the commercial at the beginning, and then click the "play all" button from the main menu, it takes me back to the spot in the commercial where it left off. It doesn't always do that but it's so annoying when it does!
My toddler loves this show and the songs haven't gotten old even though it is watched a lot.
Love it!
Son loves it!!!
I can't stop singing these songs. My kids have loved them for years. Passing it on to my neice.
My 13 month old grandson loves Veggie Tales!
Such a great dvd full of all the best Silly songs for kids!
Always a house favorite
